nodes.name: Set Configuration
nodes.notes:
Configure Processing:

folder_path: Path to video folder
target_stage: discovered, prepped, transcribed, enriched, rendered
force_reprocess: Set true to reprocess existing videos

nodes.name: Process Episode
nodes.notes:
30 minute timeout for full processing with AI enrichment

Processing breakdown:
- Transcription (Whisper): 5-7 min
- AI Enrichment (Ollama): 8-12 min
- HTML Generation: <1 min

Total: ~15-20 min per video

Timeout set to 30 min (1800000ms) for safety margin
